articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Rashid Khan gets emotional after Afghanistan's fairytale World Cup run ends in semi-final: ‘We will always remember…’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rashid Khan penned a heartwarming note to express gratitude after Afghanistan lost its first-ever T20 World Cup semi-final to South Africa. | Crickit
articles.content: Rashid Khan was visibly emotional after Afghanistan lost its first-ever semi-final of the T20 World Cup 2024 to South Africa on Thursday. Breaking their semi-final jinx in the 2024 edition of the ICC… [+2080 chars]
